item.title: Delays, smaller payments: How SNAP funding will work
item.description: The White House said it would give partial payments to 42 million recipients.

item.title: Diane Ladd dies, daughter Laura Dern confirms
item.description: Ladd starred on television and in movies including "Rambling Rose."

item.title: Despite charging 4 suspects in the Louvre heist, stolen jewels still missing
item.description: The investigation of the Paris museum robbery has stretched into its 16th day.

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: WATCH: LA Dodgers fans take to streets to celebrate World Series win
item.description: Celebrating fans took to the streets in Los Angeles as the Dodgers won their second consecutive World Series.
